page.title: 17ST PETER'S CHURCH,BROUGHTON
page.content: IN 1983 THE CHURCH HAD A FLOWER FESTIVAL TO CELEBRATE THE 350TH ANNIVERSARY OF ST.PETER'S.WE HAVE AN ECUMENICAL LINK WITH THE FRANCISCAN NUNS AT BROUGHTON HALL,AND FAIR OAK INDEPENDENT METHODISTS.THEY JOIN IN SOME OF OUR SERVICES,WE ATTEND THEIR FUND RAISING EVENTS AND UNITED SERVICES.OUR YOUNGER POPULATION IS VERY SMALL.OUR CHILDREN OF SCHOOL AGE ATTEND THE SUNDAY SCHOOL AT THE INDEPENDENT METHODIST CHURCH AT CROXTON. WHEN THEY ARE OLDER THEY EITHER BECOME ADULT MEMBERS IN INDEPENDENT METHODISM OR ARE PREPARED FOR CONFIRMATION AS ANGLICANS.
